description:
Da Cider brings Lamune a new quest, one of the highest importance! The trouble is, Milk and Lesca find out about it too.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arata ni Tabidate Ai no Senshi-tachi
Passionate Pursuit in Wakuwaku Space-time - Warriors of Love, Begin a New Journey!
新たに旅立て愛の戦士たち
